## Installation

You can install the development version of Kaashi from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ehyaei/kaashi")
```

## How Create Kashi

```{r}
library(Kaashi)
plot(kaashi(tarh(theta = 45, delta = 0.5), n = 5))
```
